entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming south 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow and local blowing snow beginning in the morning. Wind south 20 km/h becoming east 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 35 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 21.
